entity.name: Manjushri" - Buddhist Mythology
entity.subtitle: Bodhisattva of Transcendent Wisdom
entity.description: Manjushri (Sanskrit: "Gentle Glory") embodies the prajna (transcendent wisdom) of all Buddhas. He wields the flaming sword of discriminating awareness that cuts through ignorance, delusion, and dualistic thinking, revealing the empty nature of all phenomena. He is the patron of scholars, teachers, and all who seek understanding of ultimate truth.
